title: Mini-Ep 183: Grace and Space
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 183: Grace and Space
itunes:subtitle: Kate suffers a hangover and debates ditching alcohol altogether and Doree slathers on a sport sunscreen that might just do the trick. Then, listeners call in about which cozy mystery to read next, armpit detoxes, and how to ceremoniously let go of the ...
description:
Kate suffers a hangover and debates ditching alcohol altogether and Doree slathers on a sport sunscreen that might just do the trick. Then, listeners call in about which cozy mystery to read next, armpit detoxes, and how to ceremoniously let go of the past year.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • LITERATI - Go to literati.com/FOREVER35 for 25% off your first two orders. 
  • BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.
  • SQUARESPACE - Head to Squarespace.com/FOREVER35 and use the offer code FOREVER35 to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.
  • ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • BROOKLINEN - Get 10% off your first order and free shipping when you use promo code FOREVER35, only at Brooklinen.com.
